title: Devouer nerf? why.
body: why did you lower the sated damage to 50 an give the stack some whacky ammount. how the hell am i going to do .67 magic damage to someone when the game uses base numbers lol. i dont crit someone for 459.69 like wtf. devourer was balanced you had to clear your camps and watch out for countr jungling and also secure objectives to get sated quicker. rip devourer junglers. welcome back lee sin and j4 and vi an the other warrior abusing champions.
